name: Ball Challenge 2
description:
💎 DESCRIPTION 💎

Ball Challenge 2 is a 2D physics-based adventure game with puzzle and challenge elements. Use the mouse to move the ball and collect all the diamonds in the level while dodging traps.

💎 FEATURES 💎

  • Fast-paced physics-based gameplay;
  • Top score ranking in each level;
  • Beautiful cartoon graphics;
  • Fun and challenging puzzles;
  • Play in snow, desert, countryside, mines and more!

💎 LANGUAGE / IDIOMA 💎

The game is available in English and Portuguese!

O jogo está disponível em Inglês e Português-BR!

💎 MENU UPDATE 💎

This complete version of Ball Challenge 2 includes:

  • 41 STAGES;
  • 6 WORLDS;
  • All skins UNLOCKED;
  • WITHOUT any ADS.
  • You can participate in the FINAL CHAMPIONS RANKING at the end of the game.
